subcat.name: Alberta Education Schools
subcat.detail:
Overview

This dataset includes 2 thousand schools registered with Alberta Education, Government of Alberta. Alberta Education supports students, parents, teachers and administrators from Early Childhood Services (ECS) through Grade 12. Each school is registered with school number, school name, school location, contact information, etc.

Dataset Information

Jurisdiction Province of Alberta
Data Provider Alberta Education Web Services

subcat.name: Ontario Approved Driving Schools
subcat.detail:
Overview

This dataset includes 1.4 driving schools offer government-approved courses, approved by the Province of Ontario, Ministry of Transportation (MTO). A government-approved beginner driver education course must offer 10 hours of flexible instruction time, in addition to the 20 hours of classroom instruction and 10 hours of in-vehicle lessons. Each school is registered with school name, school address, school phone number, service city, etc.

Dataset Information

Jurisdiction Province of Ontario
Data Provider Province of Ontario, Ministry of Transportation (MTO)
